parameters.name: DbInstType
parameters.description: The type of the database engine.

parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Distributed Relational Database Service (DRDS) instance.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the query. Specify the time in the UNIX timestamp format. The time must be in UTC. Unit: ms.

parameters.name: Keys
parameters.description:
The performance monitoring metrics. You can specify one or more metrics for a query at a time. Separate multiple metric parameters with commas (,).

>  For more information about the details of performance monitoring metrics, see [Storage monitoring](~~186705~~).

parameters.name: RdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the storage-layer ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the query. Specify the time in the UNIX timestamp format. The time must be in UTC. Unit: ms.
